projectsList.title: Pizpiretos
projectsList.description: Pizpiretos is a mobile app that allows pets to find their soulmates. It is a social network for pets. The app is built with React Native and the backend is built with NestJs. The app uses sockets to provide real-time updates. The app also uses Firebase for authentication and storage.
